analyzed: om
śrīmat prabhākara guru tantra dhurandhareṇa

nyāyasiddhi ākhyayā vyākhyayā viṣama sthala ṭipparāyā
ca samalaṅkṛtā
daśamam prakaraṇam
paribhāvya abhidhīyate
atra sugata mata anusāriṇaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ sarvān eva bhāvān abhidadhati
kim punar teṣām tatra pramāṇam
tāvat pratyakṣam kṣaṇika tām īkṣitum
nipuṇataram nirīkṣamāṇasya kṣaṇika tva adhyavasāya abhāvāt
syāt eṣā kṣaṇikatā nāma bhāva svabhāva bahis bhāvinī
tena bhāva anubhavāt eva pratyakṣam kṣaṇika tām api sākṣātkaroti iti
tat idam manoratha mātram manyante matimantaḥ
tathā hi saṃvid niṣṭhāḥ viṣaya vyavasthitayaḥ iti sthitiḥ iyam avivādā sarva vādinām

original: tadiyamapi kṣaṇikatā bhāvasya svabhāvabhūta satī saṃvittimadhirohantī tadavyatirekeṇavyavatiṣṭhate, nānyathā /
analyzed: tat iyam api kṣaṇikatā bhāvasya svabhāva bhūta satī saṃvittim adhirohantī tad a vyatirekeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate na anyathā
na ca tathā saṃvidam udīyamānām udīkṣām āha iti
kutas tasyāḥ bhāva svabhāva antar bhāvitā
kutastarān ca tad avabodhena avabodhaḥ

original: atha manvīran---kṣaṇikatā pratyakṣamīkṣyamāṇāpi1011 na niścayapathamavatīrṇā tenāgṛhītevāvabhāti,

original: yatra hi pratyakṣasya svabhāvato vikalpavihariṇastat--1013pṛṣṭhabhāvinā savikalpakapratyayena vyāpāro 'nugamyate,

yatra ca dṛṣṭam etat iti pratyayaḥ na udīyate

yat api kecid ūcire pratyakṣam jñānam kṣaṇikam
sva kāla ākalita vastu viṣaya tayā kṣaṇikatām avagamayati iti
tat api bāliśa bhāṣitam
eka kṣaṇa mātra vartti tā hi kṣaṇika tā
na tat pratyakṣeṇa idānīm eva idam
kāla antaram pratyakṣasya
pratyuta pratyabhijñā lakṣaṇam pratyakṣam eva kṣaṇika tām dūram upakṣipati
pūrva apara kāla a kalita bhāva avakalpanāt

original: anumānamapi sambandhānusandhānanibandhanaṃ kṣaṇikatāṃ na pakṣīkartuṃ kṣamate,
analyzed: anumānam api sambandha anusandhāna nibandhanam kṣaṇikatām na pakṣīkartum kṣamate

original: santaśca sarve bhāvā iti bhāvamātrānubandhini sādhye svabhāvaheturbhavati /
analyzed: santaḥ ca sarve bhāvāḥ iti bhāva mātra anubandhini sādhye svabhāva hetuḥ bhavati
yathā aśiṃśapā tvam vṛkṣa tve
śiṃśapā mātra anubandhi hi vṛkṣa tvam

akṣaṇika tve hi vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ sattām bādhate

na aparā kācid asti
sā ca krama yaugapadyābhyām vyāptā
anayoḥ paraspara pratipakṣa tayā eka pratiṣedhasya itara vidhi nāntarīyaka tvāt
na ca krama yaugapadye kṣaṇikeṣu sambhavataḥ
te tu nivartamāne sattām api nivartayataḥ
vṛkṣa tvam śiṃśapā tvam iva
katham akṣaṇikeṣu krama yaugapadyābhyām artha kriyā virahaḥ
atra āhuḥ hi bhāvaḥ ṛtha kriyā janana svabhāvaḥ vā bhavet
a tad svabhāvaḥ vā
na aparaḥ prakāraḥ asti
tatra agrima pakṣa parigrahe sarvāsām arthakriyāṇām ekasmin eva kṣaṇe kṛta tvāt

asat lakṣaṇa tva āpatteḥ akṣaṇika tva hāniḥ

asat lakṣaṇa tva āpattiḥ eva
syāt matam samarthaḥ pi svabhāvataḥ bhāvaḥ sahakāri samavadhāna vaśena kadācid karoti
tad abhāvāt ca anyadā na iti
tat api vimardam na kṣamate

original: sa hi sahakārī kiñcidārabhate, na vā ?
analyzed: sa hi sahakārī kiñcid ārabhate na vā
tena ārabhyamāṇam api arthakriyā sādhanatva abhimata bhāva svabhāva bhūtam
uta a tad svabhāva bhūtam vā iti vikalpanīyam
anārambha pakṣe pekṣā arthaḥ bhidhātavyaḥ
na khalu an upakārakam pratyapekṣā arthavatī
arthakriyā sādhana tva abhimata bhāva svabhāva bhūtasya ārambhe ca bhāvasya api utpattiḥ āpatati
hi an utpadyamānaḥ utpadyamāna svabhāvaḥ bhavati

bhāva udaya aṅgīkāre
bhāvasya prāk asādhaka tvāt

a tad svabhāvaḥ

original: nanu te 'pyanyanirapekṣā eva janakāḥ kimiti na kāryāntaramārabhante /

aparaḥ kim karoti iti
bhavet etat evam paryāyeṇa arthakriyāyām

original: te tu hetvadhīnasannidhānā na bhavituṃ na kṣamanta iti kānupapattiḥ /

original: api ca kṛtakānāṃ bhāvānāmavaśyambhāvī vināśaḥ pratīyate /

atas hetu antara upakṣi tva viruddha tad nirapekṣa tva vyāpta dhruva bhāvi tvasya yā upalabdhiḥ
sā eva adhruva bhāvi tvasya anupalabdhiḥ

original: tathā yadi bhāvā api svahetubhyo hetvantaraṃ vināśaṃ pratyapekṣeran,

original: kiṃ kṛtakā bhāvāssvahetubhyassamupajāyamānā vinaśvarasvabhāvā eva jāyante ?

vā

vikalpa asaha tvāt

original: atra1046 kecidevaṃ samādadhati---“tadevedami“ti tattedante parasparaṃ saṃvalite samākalayadekaṃ pratyabhijñāsamākhyātaṃ pratyakṣavijñānaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgānumānaṃ  #

original: dve ete vijñāne grahaṇa-smaraṇarūpe yathāyathaṃ tattāmātre,

ca vyāpriyamāṇe na alam ubhaya anubhava sambhava samaya varti tām arthasya avabhāsayitum

tathā bhinna deśa kālam api ekatayā eva parisphurati iti

original: kevalāt pūrvānubhavasamāsāditajanmano bhāvanābhidhānāt saṃskārādvā naivaṃvighamidaṃ vijñānumudetumarhati /
analyzed: kevalāt pūrva anubhava samāsādita janmanaḥ bhāvanā abhidhānāt saṃskārāt vā na evaṃvigham idam vijñānum udetum arhati
tathā api tayoḥ anyonya samavadhāna samāsādita daśā antarayoḥ idam menire
na ca idam api ucitam
pratyakṣam eva iva idam na bhavati iti
sati api saṃskāra upayoge
indriya vyāpāra adhīna janma tayā asya prathama samāgama samaya bhāvinaḥ sakala vādinām apahastita vivādānām pratyakṣa sammatāt aviśeṣāt
na ca idam pramāṇa ābhāsam iti atra kiñcana pramāṇam asti
bādha kāraṇa doṣa viṣaya saṃvedana antara virahāt
na ca idam eva anumānam bādhakam iti cittam anurajyate
paraspara āśraya doṣa samāsakteḥ
yāvat khalu etat vijñānam a bādhitam
tāvat anumānam eva nā udetum prabhavati
sañjāte ca anumāne bādhitām idam bhavati iti
ca api kāraṇam anumāna udaye
anyathā hutavahe śīta tā kim iti nā anumīyate
nanu evam tarhi katham jvālā ādīnām eka tvena avadhāritānām anumānataḥ bheda siddhiḥ
atra siddhānta sāram udīrayanti samānya viśeṣa ātmakāni sarva vastūni
tatra jvālā ādiṣu pratyakṣam sāmānya viṣayam

bhinna gocara pracāriṇoḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ virodha abhāvāt
na pratyakṣeṇa anumāna udaya virodhaḥ
katham punar akṣaṇikasya arthakriyā kāri tā
krameṇa iti vadanti

original: sa khalu sahakārisamavadhānopahitaviśeṣāṃ bhāvastāṃ tāmarthakriyāṃ krameṇaiva samapādayati /

abhinnāni

abheda mātra āśritāni ca bheda avalambanena iti

saha darśanāt

anavasthānam ca adarśana nibandhanam
atas na asti virodhaḥ

original: sa hi dadarśa---bhedā-bhedāveva tāvadekatra na sambhavataḥ, virodhāt /

pratyabhijñāyāḥ eva parīkṣaṇīya tvāt
dṛṣṭa a śuktikāyām tat eva idam rajatam iti matiḥ

original: sā ca sādṛśyavaśena bhedāgrahaṇanibandhanaiveti yuktātrāpi parīkṣā /
analyzed: sā ca sādṛśya vaśena bheda agrahaṇa nibandhanā evā iti yuktā atra api parīkṣā
tatra parīkṣyamāṇasya arthakriyā anupapattyā kṣaṇika tve nirṇīte
yam iti niścīyate

original: bhavati ca vimṛśato 'pi1059 diṅmohādiṣvanumānavaśena jātāyā api pratīterviparyayaḥ /
analyzed: bhavati ca vimṛśataḥ diś moha ādiṣu anumāna vaśena jātāyāḥ api pratīteḥ viparyayaḥ

na viparyaya anumāna udayaḥ
tasmāt alam anena
siddhāntaḥ
samprati samādhim abhidhati stambha ādiṣu
prathamam anubhūteṣu punar antarā tirodhāna ādi vaśena vicchinna upalambheṣu punar anubhavataḥ sa
eva ayam iti tāvat jāyate matiḥ

tatas bheda agrahaṇa nibandhanaḥ yam abheda vyavahāraḥ iti kim iti kalpyate
upapadyate ca sthirāt api bhāvāt sahakāri vaśa upajāta āgantuka kriyā ādi rūpa viśeṣa bhājaḥ krameṇa arthakriyā

original: sa ca viśeṣo vyatirikta eva bhāvādarthakriyākāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca viśeṣaḥ vyatiriktaḥ eva bhāvāt arthakriyā kāriṇaḥ
na ca saḥ eva arthakriyā kārī
iti catur astram
tathāvidha viśeṣa ālīḍha tā eva tasya sādhana tā
yad anantaram artha kriyā udayaḥ
tad viśeṣa yogitayā eva bhāveṣu sādhana tava vyavahāraḥ laukikānām
katham punar asau viśeṣaḥ tasya iti vyapadiśyate
tad āśraya tayā eva anumānāt
katham punar tad āśraya tā eva
sva hetu vaśena iti matavā nivartatām bhavāt
alam asmābhiḥ dūram anuyātaiḥ
atha kasmāt bhāvasya eva bhedaḥ na anumīyate
pratyabhijñāna ānuguṇyāt iti vadāmaḥ
dṛṣṭa anusāri ca anumānam ucitam
dṛṣṭa upapatti mukha tvāt
yathā ca arthakriyā dṛśte
tathā idam api dṛśyate sthāvaraḥ bhāvaḥ iti
tad anuguṇam anumānam ucitam
tena sthāvare pi asiddhaḥ vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ
ca viparyaye bādhaka abhāvāt
asiddha tanmātra anubandhinīm kṣaṇikatām na sattā sādhayitum alam
anaikāntika tvāt iti
na ca arthakriyā kāri tā eva sattā
kintu
yatas svarūpa sattā ca pramāṇa sambandha yogya tā
atas ṛthakriyām akurvān api san iti
na kiñcid avadyam
yat tu idam uditam anapekṣāḥ bhāvāḥ vināśam pratiiti
tat api vimṛśyamānam dahyamānam jātuṣam iva ābharaṇam
kam khalu bhavantaḥ vināśam abhimanyante

original: pradhvaṃsābhāvo vināśa iti cet---kaḥ punaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvaḥ ?
analyzed: pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ vināśaḥ iti ced kaḥ punar pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ

original: “dadhni kṣīraṃ nāstīstye” vamādikā bhāvaviṣayā saṃviditi vadyucyeta,
analyzed: dadhni kṣīram vama ādikā bhāva viṣayā saṃvid iti vat yucyeta
tadā amṛtakalāyām uditā
na hi na asti iti buddhiḥ asti
kintu dadhi sva rūpa mātra anubhavaḥ eva svayamprakāśe nañ śabda prayoga mātram eva
sā eva hi payasaḥ na astitā
yā dṛśye tasmin dadhi sva rūpa mātra upalabdhiḥ

original: na ca tāṃ prati payasa eva nirapekṣasya hetutā,
analyzed: na ca tām prati payasaḥ eva nirapekṣasya hetu tā
anupanipatite hetvantare
payasaḥ eva upalabdhe

original: na cedaṃ payonataramupalabhyata iti śakyaṃ vaktum /
analyzed: na ca idam payonataram upalabhyate iti śakyam vaktum
pratyabhijñānasya abheda sādhaka tvāt
nanu ca hetu antara apekṣi tve dhruva bhāvi tā nā upapadyate
dhruva bhāvitā na upapadyate
dhruva bhāvitā eva kutas vagamyate
darśanāt iti ced
hetu antareṇa api avaśyam bhavitavyam iti
darśanāt eva avagamyatām

original: na ca bālā vayaṃ1068 yenaivaṃvidhavādād bhīṣayāmahe /
analyzed: na ca bālā yena evaṃvidha vādāt bhīṣayāmahe
yat punar idam sva hetubhyaḥ bhāvānām api naśvarāṇām utpattau
hetu antara āyatte vināśe
vyatirekiṇi jāte pi pūrvavat bhāvasya upalabdhi ādi prasaṅgaḥ iti
atra ucyate uktam asmābhiḥ yathā tanmātra upalabdhiḥ eva vināśaḥ iti
tena tasyāḥ hetu sadbhāvāt tayā eva bhavitavyam
anupalabdhiḥ api tasya sā evā iti anupalabdhiḥ eva tasya na upalabdhiḥ
tad nibandhanaḥ ca abhāva vyavahāraḥ pi iti sarvam an ākulam
sugata āśīviṣa viṣama kṣaṇa bhaṅga viṣa anala avalīḍha sāyāḥ
mīmāṃsāyām marma mayī jīva rakṣā iyam

original: iti mahāmahopādhyāyaśrīśālikānāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ mīmāṃsājīvarakṣā nāma daśamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti mahā mahā upādhyāya śrī śālikānāthamiśra praṇītāyām prakaraṇa pañcikāyām mīmāṃsājīvarakṣā nāma daśamam prakaraṇam samāptam
